name: Bedtime (nugamestudioclub, joayy, Jordan - sadprofeso, SilentDefend)
description:
It's 9 pm, past your bedtime.

 You hear your stomach growling.

You need a snack...

However, your parents are having a dinner party downstairs. Use the darkness as cover as you conduct your heist to avoid any awkward conversations!
